title: The Gates, Project for Central Park, New York City
medium: graphite, charcoal, pastel, photograph by Wolfgang Volz, wax crayon, aerial photograph, and tape, on two sheets of paper in two parts
dimensions:
sheet (top panel): 37.8 x 165 cm (14 7/8 x 64 15/16 in.)
sheet (bottom panel): 106.5 x 165 cm (41 15/16 x 64 15/16 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 144.6 x 165 cm (56 15/16 x 64 15/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
